title: New Internationalist - November 2014
description:
New Internationalist - November 2014

48 Pages | True PDF | English | 12 MB 

The magazine sets out to explain and inform, giving readers the essentials of a subject in a concise, easy-to-read full-colour format with excellent photos and graphics.  

In This Issue:
